org.xbill.Task
Class WorkerThread

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Thread
        |
        +--org.xbill.Task.WorkerThread
public class WorkerThread
extends Thread

An extension of a Thread that uses threads from a pool, rather than allocating a new thread for each assigned task.

MAX_PRIORITY, MIN_PRIORITY, NORM_PRIORITY
